fr.iutvalence.java.projet.spaceinvaders
Interface MonsterControler

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpaceInvadersMaVa, SpaceInvadersMaVs, SpaceInvadersMsVs
public interface MonsterControler

This interface defines all common method to control Monsters.
Monsters can move, and shoots.

Author:
Gallet Guyon

Method Summary
 void monsterShoot()
          Allows one of monsters to shoot.
 int monstersMove()
          Allows the monsters to move on the screen
 void waitLoop()
          This method wait a time in function of sleepTime value and of monster alive's number
 

Method Detail

monsterShoot

void monsterShoot()
Allows one of monsters to shoot.
The monster who shot do is above a tank.

monstersMove

int monstersMove()
Allows the monsters to move on the screen

Returns:
(integer) This returns the wait time between each move. When it's equals to 0 the game is finished.

waitLoop

void waitLoop()
This method wait a time in function of sleepTime value and of monster alive's number
